page.title: 14An opinion about discipline
page.content: I attend Westlands School Torquay.We have to wear a uniform.The uniform is grey for girls with a red tie and blue for the boys with a blue tie.Many of the uniform rules are pointless,for example-only one ring,bracelet or necklace,no studs larger than half a centimetre in diameter.What has this to do with our education? Nobody knows.Socks have to be worn even in the middle of summer.Stilletoe shoes are not to be worn because they damage the floor but many female teachers wear them.Hair isn't allowed to be more than two natural colours.Make-up isn't allowed until the fourth year and then it is only eye make-up. The School rules on uniform are mostly unnecessary.
